root.name: Bill Elliott's NASCAR Fast Tracks
root.description: Overview Bill Elliott's NASCAR Fast Tracks is a NASCAR themed racing game developed by Distinctive Software, Inc. and released in 1991 for the Game Boy. The game features both single player and two player modes. DifficultyFast Tracks features three different difficulty levels: Novice, Rookie, and Pro. NASCAR LicenseFast Tracks has a NASCAR License feature which serves as a name input. CarsThere are three selectable cars in Fast Tracks. Ford Thunderbird Chevrolet Lumina Oldsmobile Cutlass Tracks In NASCAR Fast Tracks there are four different tracks to race on. Each track has a default amount of miles and laps, but both can be altered.DaytonaMiles: 10Laps: 4 Daytona Sears PointMiles: 10Laps : 4 Sears Point AtlantaMiles: 10Laps: 7 Atlanta Watkins GlenMiles: 10Laps: 4 Watkins Glen
